bill.title: FIGHT Act Fighting Inhumane Gambling and High-Risk Trafficking Act
bill.description: To amend the Animal Welfare Act to provide for greater protection of roosters, and for other purposes.

committee.name: Subcommittee on Livestock, Dairy, and Poultry

referrals.name: Subcommittee on Livestock, Dairy, and Poultry

history.action: Referred to the Committee on Agriculture, and in addition to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Livestock, Dairy, and Poultry.
